title: Nationwide League of Legends Cybercafes Competition (minus WA, SA and NT - Sorry)
body:
This is the first time we are organizing this tournament, with the support of all Internet Cafes across the nations as well as ROCCAT.
All of the qualifications have been approved as the Prized Community Events.

Facebook Link: https://www.facebook.com/events/797777050297259
Battlefy Link: http://battlefy.com/mol3-tournament

Entry Fee: Various depending on the Internet Cafes

Competition Date: 
28th - 29th March 2015 (Qualifications)
18th - 19th April 2015 (Finals)

Total Cash Prize: $2000.00 (Sponsored by MOL Australia)
Total RPs: 184000
Total Mice: 20 (Sponsored by ROCCAT)
Total Mousepads: 5 (Sponsored by ROCCAT)
Total Headset: 1 (MVP - Sponsored by ROCCAT)

And other prizes provided by local Internet Cafes. These prizes are still currently being finalized.

Look forward to see you there.

replies.body: I'm sorry but, it doesn't really count as 'nationwide' if it excludes half the country. ;)

>
> I'm sorry but, it doesn't really count as 'nationwide' if it excludes half the country. ;)
